thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com
thread.title: Mark Nowicki

author: Mark Nowicki
title: Mark Nowicki
text: I can always find what I am looking for. I am installing string lights in my backyard with Japanese lanterns. I decided to go with white vinyl lanterns since the color fades after a year. I wanted to try wet location colored LED bulbs, and there is a great selection. I am trying one of each to see which one(s) I like best. Bulb specifications are very helpful. I always come back when I need bulbs.
